name: New Balance Heathertech T-shirt - Men's
description: Crush your deadlift PB or crank out that last set of pullups. This technical tee wicks moisture away from your skin and dries quickly, giving you a chafe-free workout. And a reflective shark logo keeps you visible on after-dusk runs home from the gym.Cotton and polyester blend bridges the gap between function and style.NB Dry technology wicks moisture and dries quickly.Stretch neck tape prevents chafing during high-output activities.
